DOC.brief_summary: Non-interventional , observational study physician ' use Dabigatran etexilate stroke prevention patient atrial fibrillation mild moderate renal impairment
DOC.brief_title: Dabigatran Etexilate Stroke Prevention Patients With Atrial Fibrillation Mild Moderate Renal Impairment
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : patient atrial fibrillation foreseen Pradaxa anticoagulation accord physician 's decision stroke prevention patient mild moderate renal impairment age > = 18 year enrollment Exclusion criterion : severe renal impairment ( Creatinine Clearance < 30 ml/min )
